structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Unauthorized Practice Or Use Of Title; Punishment
law.text: Any person not licensed to practice psychology who holds himself out to be a psychologist or who uses the title “psychologist” or engages in the practice of psychology shall be punished by a fine of not more than five hundred dollars, or by imprisonment of not more than three months, or both such fine and imprisonment.
